
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/fkxxgis/p/18692431" title="发布于 2025-01-27 09:46">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">GIS数据合集：作物、植被数据下载平台整理</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        
        本文对目前主要的作物类型与产量、植被物候与指数数据产品的获取网站加以整理与介绍~
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>  本文对目前主要的<strong>作物类型与产量</strong>、<strong>植被物候与指数</strong>数据产品的获取网站加以整理与介绍。</p>
<p></p><div class="toc"><div class="toc-container-header">目录</div><ul><li><a href="#4-植被农业数据" rel="noopener nofollow">4 植被农业数据</a><ul><li><a href="#41-作物产量数据" rel="noopener nofollow">4.1 作物产量数据</a><ul><li><a href="#411-spam" rel="noopener nofollow">4.1.1 SPAM</a></li><li><a href="#412-aerial-intelligence" rel="noopener nofollow">4.1.2 Aerial Intelligence</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="#42-作物物候数据" rel="noopener nofollow">4.2 作物物候数据</a><ul><li><a href="#421-chinacropphen1km" rel="noopener nofollow">4.2.1 ChinaCropPhen1km</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="#43-植被指数数据" rel="noopener nofollow">4.3 植被指数数据</a><ul><li><a href="#431-index-data-base" rel="noopener nofollow">4.3.1 Index-Data-Base</a></li><li><a href="#432-modis-vegetation-index-products" rel="noopener nofollow">4.3.2 MODIS Vegetation Index Products</a></li><li><a href="#433-lai_ts_val" rel="noopener nofollow">4.3.3 LAI_TS_Val</a></li><li><a href="#434-csif" rel="noopener nofollow">4.3.4 CSIF</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul></div><p></p>
<p>  本文为“GIS数据获取整理”专栏中第四篇<strong>独立</strong>博客，因此本文全部标题均由“4”开头。本文对目前主要的农业产量、作物物候、农业植被分布、植被指数等数据获取网站加以整理与介绍。</p>
<h1 id="4-植被农业数据">4 植被农业数据</h1>
<h2 id="41-作物产量数据">4.1 作物产量数据</h2>
<h3 id="411-spam">4.1.1 SPAM</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/PRFF8V" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/PRFF8V" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/PRFF8V</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  SPAM（Spatial Production Allocation Model）是MapSPAM团队基于多种数据源生产的全球作物生产分配模型，其包括全球2010年41种作物的种植面积、收获面积、产量、作物加工产品产量、作物收获面积与产量总产值等数据。空间分辨率为8.6 km。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094602889-1176105038.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="412-aerial-intelligence">4.1.2 Aerial Intelligence</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/aerialintel/data-science-exercise" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://github.com/aerialintel/data-science-exercise" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/aerialintel/data-science-exercise</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  Aerial Intelligence是一个致力于为世界农业带来最先进数据科学的初创企业，其在<strong>GitHub</strong>上发布了美国几个县的小麦产量，初衷是为了鼓励用户基于合适的数据分析方法实现作物产量预测。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094557034-1237946477.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="42-作物物候数据">4.2 作物物候数据</h2>
<h3 id="421-chinacropphen1km">4.2.1 ChinaCropPhen1km</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/ChinaCropPhen1km_A_high-resolution_crop_phenological_dataset_for_three_staple_crops_in_China_during_2000-2015_based_on_LAI_products/8313530/6" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/ChinaCropPhen1km_A_high-resolution_crop_phenological_dataset_for_three_staple_crops_in_China_during_2000-2015_based_on_LAI_products/8313530/6" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/ChinaCropPhen1km_A_high-resolution_crop_phenological_dataset_for_three_staple_crops_in_China_during_2000-2015_based_on_LAI_products/8313530/6</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  ChinaCropPhen1km是由我国学者开发的全国2000年至2015年三种主要作物（水稻、小麦、玉米）物候数据集，每一个年份对应的每一种作物的每一个物候期分别是一张图像，像素值为该年份中该作物该种物候期对应的时间（儒略日）。其空间分辨率为1 km。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094557099-255745209.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="43-植被指数数据">4.3 植被指数数据</h2>
<h3 id="431-index-data-base">4.3.1 Index-Data-Base</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.indexdatabase.de/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://www.indexdatabase.de/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.indexdatabase.de/</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  Index-Data-Base（IDB）是一个植被指数数据资料库，而并非含有实际数据的数据库。其提供了一个索引，我们可以用以在特定的植被指数用途、指定特定的遥感平台情况下，对满足要求的植被指数加以索引。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094557075-909039047.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="432-modis-vegetation-index-products">4.3.2 MODIS Vegetation Index Products</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://modis.gsfc.nasa.gov/data/dataprod/mod13.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://modis.gsfc.nasa.gov/data/dataprod/mod13.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://modis.gsfc.nasa.gov/data/dataprod/mod13.php</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  MODIS Vegetation Index Products是基于MODIS数据、由官方生产的16日植被指数数据产品，包括NDVI与EVI两种。其空间分辨率为250 m，500 m，1 km，0.05°。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094557116-1596523059.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="433-lai_ts_val">4.3.3 LAI_TS_Val</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://zenodo.org/record/4393164#.X-V4HthLhPY" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://zenodo.org/record/4393164#.X-V4HthLhPY" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://zenodo.org/record/4393164#.X-V4HthLhPY</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  LAI_TS_Val（LAI time-series validation）是一个全球2001年至2011年长时间序列LAI验证数据集产品，具有924个验证数据，空间分辨率为1 km。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094557032-1183029275.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="434-csif">4.3.4 CSIF</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/CSIF/6387494" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">网址</a>：<a href="https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/CSIF/6387494" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/CSIF/6387494</a></li>
</ul>
<p>  CSIF是基于MCD43C4数据生产的全球叶绿素荧光参数数据集。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3080295/202501/3080295-20250127094557282-567614924.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>  至此，大功告成。</p>

</div>
